Greetings to Russian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Mikhail Mikhailovich Kasyanov, Prime Minister of Russia, on the occasion of its National Day.
 Expressing belief that the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the fundamental interests of the two peoples, the message wished the prime minister greater success in his work and the Russian people wellbeing and prosperity.

articles.content:
Greetings to Russian President
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin today on the occasion of the National Day of the Russian Federation.
 Sincerely wishing the president greater success in his responsible work for the social stability and the prosperity of the country, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the political, economic, cultural and other fields in the spirit of the treaty and the joint declarations signed between the two states.
